import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Login() { const navigate = useNavigate(); async function handleLogin(event) { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(event.target); const payload = { email: formData.get('email'), password: formData.get('password') } const response = await fetch('https://service-provider-apis.onrender.com/api/v1/user/login', { method: 'POST', mode: 'cors', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(payload) }); const data = await response.json(); if (data.success === true) navigate('/ticketStatus', { state: { token: data.token, user: data.user } }); else { // display error message from backend as alert. alert(data.message); } } return ( <>
